fulltext:
BANH TRIET DAT 
Senior Software Developer (T33) 
Cell Phone: +84 906 980 240 
Email: trietdat@gmail.com  
Address: 361/3A Phan Van Tri St, Ward 11, Binh Thanh District, HCM city, Vietnam DOB: 20.10.1980 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/dat-banh-6b35a1135/ 
Highlight 
Be expertise in Java and JavaScript as full-stack development, especially web-based applications and backend 
persistent layers. I have mindset of continuously learning and improvement of new things, so always equip 
myself expertise knowledge in both software engineering and leadership skill. Therefore, I would like to keep 
learning further about hands-on experience on orchestration chain tools of cloud development as well as 
technical solution architect on domain knowledge. 
Education 
Master Software Engineering 
IEI Institute, National University - Bordeaux, Vietnam  
Oct 2017 - Now 
Bachelor of Science in Computing 
FPT - Greenwich University, Vietnam 
Jul 2011 - Jun 2012 
Higher Diploma in Software Engineering  
FPT - Aptech, Vietnam  
Sep 2001 - Dec 2003 
Certification 
Sun Certified Java Programmer, Standard Edition 6 (SCJP6) 
Aug 30, 2008 
Sun Certified Web Component Developer , Enterprise Edition 5 (SCWCD5) 
Nov 08, 2008 
Employment History 
SAP Asia (Vietnam) 
Jun 2009 to May 2019 
Viettel Tower, 14th Floor, 285 CMT8 St, Ward 12 
District 10, Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam. 
HarveyNash Vietnam 
Jul 2006 to May 2008 
Etown2 building, 10th Floor, 364 Cong Hoa St 
Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam. 
SaiGon Software Development (SDC) 
Jul 2004 to Jun 2006 
10 Co Giang St, District 1, Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam. 
Practical Skills 
 
Java JDK 1.8, Log4J, JUnit, and Mockito. 
 
Javascript, SAP UI5 framework, QUnit. 
 
Node JS, Mocha. 
 
Maven2, Ant. 
 
Java Persistence API (JPA), ORM Hibernate, EJB3. 
 
Java API for XML Processing (JAXP) using SAX and DOM. 
 
Apache FOP (Formatting Object Processor) with XSL-FO for pdf generation, JasperReport and iReport tool 
 
REST API with Servlet, Gson and Java JSON processing. 
 
Web Service and RPC with WSDL, Java/XML serialization/marshalling using JAXB library, and XML Schema Definition 
(XSD) 
Websocket, a state full handshake connection between web-based client and server. 
Infrastructure as Code (IaS) in the Dockerized CI Jenkin based on Docker image, Dockerfile, Jenkin Job DSL, and 
Pipeline syntax. 
Dockerized Selenium E2E testing with selenium hub, browser node. 
Apache Tomcat web server, Jetty, Glassfish. 
Eclipse, atom, sublime text editor. 
Multi-threaded application, Software Architecture, Design Pattern. 
UML, TAM (Technical Architecture Modeling). 
Git source control. 
Databases Oracle, PL/SQL, MS SQL Server, Inmemory DB, Mongo DB, My SQL 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Professional Experiences 
SAP Asia (Vietnam) 
HANA Performance Management Tools (2016 - 2019) 
 Description: A core component of HANA Cockpit 2.0 on SAP HANA Application Extended Services Advanced (XSA). It 
provides solution of analysis, resolution about performance aspects of a database, this project is a web-tools based 
and consists of 4 components such as Performance Monitoring, Workload Analyzer, Capture and Replay, and SQL 
Analyzer, which is used to interact with HANA database in order to support performance experts, even developers 
to analyze, capture, pre-process, replay workloads and visualize SQL plan in the performance optimization as well as 
intelligent database tuning. 
 Responsibility and Role 
- 
Development manager of HANA Performance Tools VN team in resource allocation, progress tracking, and 
mainly accountable for all agile development process and engineering activities, also connecting team members 
to delivery both HANA performance on-premise application and cloud services in time. 
- 
Also play Scrum master role to drive and facilitate scrum artifacts in team. 
- 
Topic leader is involved in the development of Capture and Replay component together with other components. 
- 
Join workshop in Korea to exchange about product vision together individual goals in team. 
 Technology 
- 
Javascript, HTML5, SAP UI5 Framework. 
- 
Java, NodeJS, XS Advanced as micro service architecture based on cloud foundry specification. 
- 
Eclipse-based Studio, atom, sublimetext editor. 
- 
Database: HANA In-memory. 
 Achievement 
- 
Adopt the recent development process model of DevOps principles, Cloud Foundry Micro service, traceability 
improvement, and single code line in Trunk based development including feature toggle, master red, TDD unit 
test coverage and BDD acceptance test criteria together with automation pipeline in order to reach out to 
shorten cycle CD/CI HANA Cockpit 2.0 with different support packages such as SP06 (Apr 2018), SP07 (Jul 2018), 
SP08 (Oct 2019), SP09 (Jan 2019), and the latest SP10 (Apr 2019). 
- 
Setup the daily report notification of E2E selenium testing in HANA Performance team by using selenium 
dockerized system as IaC (Infrastructure as Code). 
- 
Provide daily performance measurement report by using SAP SUPA tool (Single User Performance Analysis)  and 
Jenkin integration for automation notification to team which including aspects Web UI loading, latency, and 
response time… 
- 
Utilize dockerized TestLink, a web-based test case system management, which is used to manage test suits, test 
plan, and test case scenario which depicted by BDD syntax as common business language to team and other 
stakeholders. 
- 
Cockpit for Operator Process has been formalized in cross-location team as DoD (Developer on Duty) including 
customer ticket handling, CVS (Centralized Validation System) upgrading. 
- 
Develop Cockpit Fiori Lauchpad as entry point landscape for all components in SP07 – July 2018. 
SAP Web IDE and HRTT (2013 - 2016) 
 Description: This project includes 2 flavors, one WEB IDE on HANA Application Extended Services Classic (XSC) and 
HANA Runtime Tools (HRTT) on HANA Extended Application Services Advanced (XSA) as micro service. This is a web-
based application tooling, which includes some core editors such as Editor, SQL Console, Data Preview involving 
advanced web-based functionalities like Server Javascript Debugger, SQL Debugger … allow developers to be able to 
easily and quickly manage, develop SAP HANA application, compose SQL statements, and display artifact content in 
database.  
 Responsibility and Role 
- 
Team leaders are mainly in charge of team activities, development and delivery process. 
- 
Senior developer and also take a Product owner role in order to communicate with stakeholders for clear 
requirements 
- 
Be trained and workshop with colleagues in Germany. 
 Technology 
- 
Javascript, HTML5, SAP UI5 Framework. 
- 
NodeJS, XSJS (Extended Server Javascript), XS Advanced as micro service. 
- 
Eclipse-based Studio, atom, sublimetext editor. 
- 
Database: HANA In-memory. 
 Achievement 
- 
Integrate four components as single product SAP Web IDE XSC including Editor, Catalog, Security and Trace. 
- 
Release Web IDE XSC (HANA_IDE_CORE DU) in HANA Auto Content package in many Delivery Units (DU) for 
SPS10, and  SPS11 HANA 1 ... 
- 
Successfully migrate in parity, only Catalog component from SAP Web IDE HANA XSC to new product HANA 
Runtime Tools (HRTT) on XSA micro service with revision HANA 1 SPS11, SPS12. 
Enterprise Single Sign On (2011 - 2013) 
 Description: Single Sign-On (SSO) is a system, which manages your accounts including username and passwords in 
order to automatically logon or single sign on into web based or desktop applications at client side. Besides, the 
system also provides a central management, which allows administrators to be able to synchronize SSO data 
between user client and server. 
 Responsibility and Role: Software engineer. 
 Technology 
- 
Web Dynpro SAP Framework, EJB3 Persistence. 
- 
Netweaver AS Java. 
- 
Eclipse-based Netweaver Studio. 
- 
Database: SQL Server. 
Trust Manager Enterprise (2009 - 2011) 
 Description: An innovative solution for the lifecycle management of cards/tokens including recovery for lost or 
broken cards. A distributed system works as n-tier architecture, which consists of components such as Key Server, 
CIS Server and RA-CIS Client,  Local/Remote Assistant Client. 
 Responsibility and Role: Software engineer. 
 Technology 
- 
Jasper Report for PIN sheet delivery. 
- 
Java swing for client RA-CIS desktop-based application. 
- 
TCP socket, RMI for CIS and KEY server. 
- 
Build installation package with Install Shield. 
- 
Database: Oracle 9i, 10g & 11. 
HarveyNash VietNam 
XLS (eXtended Loyalty System, 2006 - 2008) 
 Description:  
- 
This is an outsourcing project, customer is WRT (Welcome Real Time), Singapore. 
- 
XLS is an enterprise solution which is developed by using Oracle and Java technology.  XLS adds enhanced EMV 
capabilities to a bank’s payment authorization and processing system. 
- 
This project includes many small projects and is developed with different versions. Each project takes 3, 4 man 
months. 
 Responsibility and Role:  
- 
Software engineer in development and maintenance 
- 
I went to Singapore to work and be trained from customer for 8 months 
 Technology 
- 
Struts, Webwork, Hibernate and Spring, Velocity, Jasper Report, Quartz schedule and ajax dojo library. 
- 
Apache Tomcat Server, Weblogic and Websphere. 
- 
Eclipse 3.x IDE & Plugin, PLSQL Developer for Oracle DB, CVS, VSS Source Control, Maven2, Ant deploy tool, JUnit 
Testing, JDK 5.0. 
- 
Database: Oracle 9i & 10g. 
- 
Mantis bug tracker system. 
SaiGon Software Development (SDC) 
NEC Project (2004 - 2006) 
 Description: Our sourcing project, customer is Japanese market, this project mainly focused on banking application 
which is built for NEC (Japan) to manage banking activities in Japanese banks, including seal verification support, 
personal identification, cheque recognition… 
 Responsibility and Role: Software engineer in coding based on specification documents and writing test code. 
 Technology  
- 
A client-server based application was developed in Visual Basic together with TrueDBGrid Pro, Lead Tools, Active 
Report software component for displaying and manipulating data from SQL Sever database. 
- 
Some components was deployed on IIS server using ASP.NET and VB.NET technology. 
KT Project  (2004) 
 Description: This project for Korean customers - A billing system Telecom as web-based application. 
 Responsibility and Role: Software engineer in coding  based on specifications, code review and writing test code. 
 Technology:  
- 
Frontend with Gauce component JavaScript and JSP servlet together with J2EE, EJB as backend. 
- 
This application is deployed on Weblogic server by using ant tools interacting with Oracle database.
